item.title: Flytipping of 20 black bin bags full of rubbish in the stream infront of the Our Lady of the Rosary Catholic Primary School nursery, 18th July
item.description:
Flytipping of 20 black bin bags full of rubbish in the stream infront of the Our Lady of the Rosary Catholic Primary School nursery - they already have a rat problem in that area and are worried its going to attract more vermin and near the school as well, it is concerning - please can this be removed asap
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Holbeach Gardens, Blackfen, Sidcup, London

item.title: Tree - low branches, 18th July
item.description:
This tree is pretty but it is causing trouble. High sided vehicles hit the branches. Berry fruit from the low branches overhang two driveways (numbers 50 & 52) and are staining cars and driveways. Our neighbours at number 52 have agreed to me informing you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Townley Road, Bexley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Subsidence, 18th July
item.description:
There is serious subsidence on the bus route in front of my property. This is used by 3 routes- 343, 484, P12 and N343. Every time a bus passes over this point in the road (see photo)the whole house shakes violently. I have lived here for 24 years and but it is only in the last month I have been woken up by the passing tremors of the N343. The significant immediate issue is the constant waking and a longer term issue is structural damage to multiple properties.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Merttins Road, Nunhead, London
Report on FixMyStreet
